00006 #include "ORVDigitizerDecoder.hh"

00008 class ORMCA927Decoder: public ORVDigitizerDecoder
00009 {
00010   public:
00011     ORMCA927Decoder();
00012     virtual ~ORMCA927Decoder() {}
00013     enum EMCA927Consts {kBufHeadLen = 10};
00014                                            
00015     virtual std::string GetDataObjectPath()                     { return "ORMCA927Model:Spectrum"; }  
00016     virtual std::string GetDictionaryObjectPath()       { return "ORMCA927Model"; }  
00017     virtual bool SetDataRecord(UInt_t* record);
00018        
00019         //inline functions: ************************************************************************
00020         inline UShort_t GetChannelNum()                 { return ( fDataRecord[1] & 0x00001000 ) >> 12;}
00021         inline UShort_t GetDevice()                             { return ( fDataRecord[1] & 0x00000fff );}
00022         inline Double_t   GetLiveTime()                 { return (fDataRecord[2] * 0.020);}
00023         inline Double_t   GetRealTime()                 { return (fDataRecord[3] * 0.020);}
00024         inline size_t   GetWaveformLen()                { return (LengthOf(fDataRecord) - kBufHeadLen);}
00025         inline UInt_t*  GetWaveformDataPointer(){ return (UInt_t*)(fDataRecord + kBufHeadLen);}
00026         
00027     // Waveform Functions
00028     virtual size_t CopyWaveformData(UInt_t* waveform, size_t len);
00029     virtual size_t CopyWaveformDataDouble(double* waveform, size_t len);
00030         
00031     //Error checking:
00032     virtual bool IsValid();
00033     virtual void DumpBufferHeader();
00034    
00035     //debugging:
00036     void Dump(UInt_t* dataRecord);
00037     
00038     /* Adhering to ORVDigitizerDecoder interface. This device doesn't use most of these*/
00039     virtual double GetSamplingFrequency()                                       { return 1;}
00040     virtual UShort_t GetBitResolution()                                         { return 12;}
00041     virtual size_t GetNumberOfEvents()                                          { return 1;}
00042     virtual ULong64_t GetEventTime(size_t /*event*/)            { return 0; }
00043     virtual UInt_t GetEventEnergy(size_t /*event*/)                     { return 0; }
00044     virtual UShort_t GetEventChannel(size_t /*event*/)          { return GetChannelNum();}
00045     virtual size_t GetEventWaveformLength(size_t /*event*/) { return GetWaveformLen(); }
00046     virtual UInt_t GetEventWaveformPoint( size_t /*event*/, size_t waveformPoint );
00047 
00048 };
